DOC.brief_summary: The study will assess the burden of influenza by age, risk status, vaccination status and influenza subtype, in order to create a complete profile of the burden of influenza-related morbidity and mortality in United Kingdom from 1996 to 2008.
DOC.brief_title: Influenza Burden Assessment in the United Kingdom, 1996-2008
DOC.detailed_description: This epidemiological study is a modelling of time series retrospectively extracted from multiple databases. The data collection will be a query of existing electronic healthcare databases.
DOC.criteria: â€¢ Registration with an acceptable flag in the GPRD, or registration with a potentially influenzarelated event in the HES database or the ONS mortality data.
